info.title: OPERA Cloud Event Configuration API
info.description:
This API caters for Event Configuration in OPERA Cloud.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 21.3.0.0.

get.description:
This API allows you to Use this API to get Room Type Pool and the associated Room Types.

OperationId:fetchRoomTypePool

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if inactive room types should be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical sleep room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

parameters.name: summaryInfo
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if summary or detailed information should be fetched.

200.description: Response object for fetch room pool information.

post.description:
This API allows you to Use this API to create Room Type Pools.

OperationId:createRoomTypePool

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomTypePoolCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for creating new room pool.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

delete.summary: Delete  Room Type Pool and Mappings
delete.description:
Use this API to delete Room Type Pool and Mappings.

OperationId:removeRoomTypePool

parameters.name: roomPoolCode
parameters.description: Unique Code of room type pool.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of room pool type.

parameters.name: defaultText
parameters.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 1000.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for the translation.

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: Sequence for representing room type pool record.

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Indicates the room type is inactive or not.

parameters.name: numberOfRooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms for this room type.

parameters.name: roomClass
parameters.description: Room class for the room type code.

parameters.name: shortDescription
parameters.description: Short Description of room type.

parameters.name: activeDate
parameters.description: Active date of the room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is pseudo.

parameters.name: accessible
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

parameters.name: sendToInterface
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is sent to interface.

parameters.name: sellSequence
parameters.description: Indicates room types sell sequence.

parameters.name: suite
parameters.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

parameters.name: meetingRoom
parameters.description: Indicates room type is meeting room. This Can be Meeting room flag cannot be unmarked at the property level. Can only be marked for non pseudo room types.

parameters.name: restricted
parameters.description: Indicates that the room pool cannot be used to allocate inventory to this room type. Inventory must be allocated directly to the room type itself.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update Room Type Pool and Associated Room Types.

parameters.name: hotelId
